data.actual_result: It appears in a weird place or it does not appear at all
data.expected_result: Emote Picker appears at the normal place
data.short_description: Emote Picker does not appear when you try to react an old Message with emote picker.(Read the full report before trying)
data.steps_to_repro: - Find an old Message - Right click to open the menu - Scroll down without closing the menu - try to open the emote picker from that menu
